basics.name: Qilin Li
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate in Computer Science and Technology at South China University of Technology. Research interests include affective computing and neural networks.

work.name: South China University of Technology
work.position: Ph.D. Candidate in Computer Science and Technology
work.summary: Conducting research on affective computing and neural networks under the supervision of Prof. Tong Zhang and Prof. C. L. Philip Chen.
highlights: Focused on music emotion recognition and EEG-based affective computing.
Developed deep learning models and large-scale emotion datasets.
